Bey Herrn Johann Heinrich Flick Buchbinder an der Freyenstra�fc, ist wiederum frisch angelangt, <BIBL><TITLE>der hinckende Mercurius, oder neue Calender, darinnen das sehr curiose Gespr�e4ch im Reich der Todten, zwischen dem Lord Lopat, welcher <YEAR>1747</YEAR> den 23. Aprill, wegen der Schottl�e4ndischen Rebellion, zu Londen ist enthauptet worden, und anderer Persohnen, die im verwichenen Jahr ein ungl�fcckseelig Ende auf der Welt genohmen, vorstellende die Straffe des B�f6sen und Belohnung des Guten</TITLE>, anjetzo das Stuck �a0 <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> Es wird auch bey ihme n�e4chster Tagen anlangen: <BIBL><TITLE>Der Durchlauchtige Welt-Begriff aller jetztregierender H�e4ubteren des gantzen Erd-Kreises</TITLE>, <YEAR>1748</YEAR>, das Stuck �a0 <PRIZE>4. xr.</PRIZE></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":6,"explanation":"1) Removed an erroneous inner </TITLE> that appeared before the first <YEAR>; the title now runs continuously until the correct closing </TITLE> after the descriptive clause.
2) Normalized <YEAR> elements by removing trailing periods inside the tags (1747., 1748.) to make them plain years (1747, 1748), which is more appropriate for structured data.
3) Corrected broken or mis-encoded words that were clearly OCR/encoding errors while keeping historical orthography otherwise: "ne�aue" → "neue"; "Gspr�a7ch" → "Gespr�e4ch"; "un-gl�backseelig" → "ungl�fcckseelig"; "B�c3�b6sen"-like sequence → "B�f6sen"; "H�a7ubteren" → "H�e4ubteren"; "Durchla�bachtige" → "Durchlauchtige". (Grouped as one correction of corrupted character sequences.)
4) Preserved and normalized non-breaking spaces around the price marker (the dagger-like sign) as regular or explicit spaces (represented here as \u00a0) so that <PRIZE> content is clean and the structure remains valid XML.
5) Ensured that both <BIBL> structures are well-formed: each has a single <TITLE>, followed by a <YEAR> (for the second item) and a <PRIZE>, all properly nested and closed.
6) Verified that the outer <ITEM> element cleanly wraps the entire advertisement text, with no stray or overlapping tags, making the whole string well-formed XML."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>15. Bey Herrn Johann Heinrich Flick Buchbinder an der Freyenstra�fc, ist wiederum frisch angelangt, <BIBL><TITLE>der hinckende Mercurius, oder neue Calender, darinnen das sehr curiose Gespr�e4ch im Reich der Todten, zwischen dem Lord Lopat, welcher <YEAR>1747</YEAR> den 23. Aprill, wegen der Schottl�e4ndischen Rebellion, zu Londen ist enthauptet worden, und anderer Persohnen, die im verwichenen Jahr ein ungl�fcckseelig Ende auf der Welt genohmen, vorstellende die Straffe des B�f6sen und Belohnung des Guten</TITLE>, anjetzo das Stuck �a0 <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> Es wird auch bey ihme n�e4chster Tagen anlangen: <BIBL><TITLE>Der Durchlauchtige Welt-Begriff aller jetztregierender H�e4ubteren des gantzen Erd-Kreises</TITLE>, <YEAR>1748</YEAR>, das Stuck �a0 <PRIZE>4. xr.</PRIZE></BIBL></ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
1) Removed an erroneous inner </TITLE> that appeared before the first <YEAR>; the title now runs continuously until the correct closing </TITLE> after the descriptive clause.
2) Normalized <YEAR> elements by removing trailing periods inside the tags (1747., 1748.) to make them plain years (1747, 1748), which is more appropriate for structured data.
3) Corrected broken or mis-encoded words that were clearly OCR/encoding errors while keeping historical orthography otherwise: "ne�aue" → "neue"; "Gspr�a7ch" → "Gespr�e4ch"; "un-gl�backseelig" → "ungl�fcckseelig"; "B�c3�b6sen"-like sequence → "B�f6sen"; "H�a7ubteren" → "H�e4ubteren"; "Durchla�bachtige" → "Durchlauchtige". (Grouped as one correction of corrupted character sequences.)
4) Preserved and normalized non-breaking spaces around the price marker (the dagger-like sign) as regular or explicit spaces (represented here as \u00a0) so that <PRIZE> content is clean and the structure remains valid XML.
5) Ensured that both <BIBL> structures are well-formed: each has a single <TITLE>, followed by a <YEAR> (for the second item) and a <PRIZE>, all properly nested and closed.
6) Verified that the outer <ITEM> element cleanly wraps the entire advertisement text, with no stray or overlapping tags, making the whole string well-formed XML.
